places_with_reviews.name: C.S.I St. Andrews Church
places_with_reviews.address: 3MP8+6CX, TOWN HALL 6TH St, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631001, India

reviews.text: Oldest church in Arakkonam with beautiful architecture , spacious and  blessings of God .

Situated in the core area of the town, the church is simple, big, elegant and beautiful. It has old bus stand to its left and Central school to its right. Its been more than 20yrs ive been visiting this church. The church also carries out many missions helping the poor and the needy.
I regularly attend the church service here and an official member of this church. Sunday service timing is 8:30 to 10:30. Also we have Youth fellowship and Men's and women's fellowship.
Oldest church in arakkonam 150 years and my daicses church Madras diocese Central area head church
Good place & nice church & good faith

places_with_reviews.name: Sri Sachidananda Sai Baba Temple
places_with_reviews.address: 4M28+F7G, Sai Baba Nagar, Arakkonam, Tamil Nadu 631001, India

reviews.text:
One of the powerful sanctum, very large temple with all amneities available.
Good parking place.
Powerful Sri Sai
Daily Annadhaanam here in afternoon.
Thursdays is very special
Donate as much as possible to contribute for new build annadhana hall
If chance available, plan to darshan Babaji.
Well maintained temple..in and around arakkonam area...

One of the sai baba temple at arakkonam sai baba nagar. Main devotee is said baba and some of the Small sanctums also here. A good place for said devotees and we can bring young and small kids too.many said baba related programme celebrated here.
Well maintained by the sai baba temple at Arakkonam by car parking and bike parking is a lot of place is there and every Thursday is Nithya anaprasadam is there for poor people
Very good ambience.. Better to avoid during rainy days because of the muddy road..
